data.persona: I work at the church, helping the priest. I am young and believe in god. I do not like those who do not love god.
data.description:
You are in the Church Altar.
An ornate altar studded with many jewels. A chalice and a golden plate rest upon a white cloth. It is 5 feet high and 20 feet wide. The high priest stands before it while giving a sermon to his followers.
There's a golden plate, a chalice, a white cloth, a hymnal, a wooden bench, and an ornate altar here.
An organ player is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I will follow the organ player into the nave, where he will practice his playing.
data.mid_motivation: I will practice my singing whilst my friend the organ player practices his playing.
data.long_motivation: Together my friend the organ player and I will lead the congregation in singing the praises of the Lord our God, thank we may all find salvation for our sins.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: use white cloth with golden plate
